documents.document: RT @choiceprize: I hope you brought your headphones with you today. It's all Irish music all day on @RTE2fm to mark the #RTEChoicePrize Son…
I’m really enjoying only Irish music being played all day today on @RTE2fm for Choice Music Prize. #irishmusic
Why did he keep getting out on bail?! https://t.co/2PfGq580mv
@magicgoeshere Thanks, I got great deals in the past when Amazon were having sales. But I can’t wait until their next sale. I was reading from my phone last night. Not ideal!
Investigation Launched Into Donnybrook Brawl https://t.co/UuyC9PsR75 via @98fm Oh dear the posh boys are letting the side down.
Does anyone know the best place to buy a Kindle? Amazon seems to be the cheapest, I’d prefer the paper looking one if possible.
My Kindle is broken. ☹️ I was in the middle of a great book. #FirstWorldProblems
@StyleGuideBlog I know you do go to a lot of trouble looking after it properly. I really do nothing so I can’t complain really!
@StyleGuideBlog Well we know you’re a stunner anyway. I’d kill to have skin like yours..
@StyleGuideBlog For someone who’s been through the mill this month you’re looking stunning.
@KTK113 I can picture you doing that no bother!
@KTK113 @SharonLeavy1 @moby_dickhead I didn’t hear any music. 16hrs ago he posted to his instastory. As Katy says, he’s grand. He’s playing video games or something.

@SharonLeavy1 Ah you mad thing! I wasn’t concerned until you said you were concerned! @KTK113 are you concerned about @moby_dickhead ? He did post on Instagram after that video was posted I think but am not 100% about. 🤔
@SharonLeavy1 You’d wake up dead! ☺️
@MartyGuilfoyle Slick 👍🏻☺️
@SharonLeavy1 Yeah, he thinks he followed him to feckin Japan so he might come down our phones & get us. Little dented head freak. 🤪
@SharonLeavy1 Yes I remember a lot of people thought something would happen at Halloween. It’s going on a long time isn’t it? To be honest I’m more on the side of it is real. 🙈
@StyleGuideBlog She looks totally different! Love the eye makeup.

@SharonLeavy1 He’s a fantastic story teller isn’t he? He left his job at Buzzfeed to work on his own illustrations & comic strips so this must’ve been to get publicity or something? He’s on Instagram too. The comments are amazing. Some people forensically breakdown each tweet!
RT @Kodaline: GALWAY you're next! Let's party! Tickets on sale this Friday! https://t.co/gnzDCj8FEx
👍🏻👍🏻 https://t.co/y3sIoPf7jw

@zrowitnez @eoghanmcdermo The kids are unaware of the dark side of the internet if their parents don’t tell them in an age appropriate way. It’s v difficult to get info across to them & not scare them. Parents need to watch their kid’s internet use very closely don’t they?
I got a pin posted to me last year. “Watch out for the free pins in your locality, or order one by calling Freephone 1800 45 45 55.” https://t.co/hAyRoXzKK8
@EmmyMaher I rang up last year & they sent it in the post. Very pretty indeed. “Watch out for the free pins in your locality, or order one by calling Freephone 1800 45 45 55.”
@useyourmind It was strange!
@yankeedoodlepad It’s a gorgeous jumper, I love the ❤️ s on the sleeves & I watched your snap story explaining them. x
@yankeedoodlepad I thought that you were your daughter in that pic Karen. I had to zoom in. 😘
@marygreenwell1 Somewhere where the people are short a few brain cells!
@stephenspierin @gordonspierin Please can someone actually set up Churros vans all over the city.
Video: Nutella prices slashed 70% in France - madness ensues https://t.co/qJMM9nVL9J ~ Stupid carry on!
@yankeedoodlepad Hope you’re having a great playcation with your granddaughters Karen, I’m sure you are xx
@WellFestIrl @KeithWalsh2fm Are you running a marathon in LA? You should mention it on air. 🤪
RT @AcousticTrench: Maple unplugs my laptop when she wants me to take a break from work and pet her 🤗🐶❤️ https://t.co/9k6OJ6t2VS
@marygreenwell1 Was looking for you on Snapchat. You’ll miss my exciting snaps about grocery shopping & the weather. Lucky you!
RT @RobotNetworksIE: Darth, Chewie and a Storm Trooper were at the Hoilday World Show in Belfast with the gang from Donegal Tourism.... htt…
@SimonTurkas I know! It’s like some kind of tiresome hobby they have.
RT @boshea5: @JenniferMaguire Why aren’t you in this morning ? If you can tweet you could kinda come in ???
@JenniferMaguire Congratulations. Great name. #LottieForGodmother #bernardforgodfather ☺️
@DoireannGarrihy @RTEplayer Oh forgot the ole hashtag #thedoireannproject
@DoireannGarrihy @RTEplayer Well done Doireann. Gas. Would’ve liked if Bobby made a cameo but it was still great. 👍🏻☺️

RT @RTE2fm: We kept the cameras rolling in studio this morning...
Here’s what @boshea5, @LottieRyan1 & @KeithWalsh2fm got up to! 😂💃🏽🕺🏽

@RTE2fm @boshea5 @LottieRyan1 @KeithWalsh2fm @DWTSIRL Fabulous, Bernard God loves a trier. 👍🏻
Excellent pic. https://t.co/2OYkHPDJY1
@StyleGuideBlog It’s great isn’t it. She’s such a nice girl. And her & Dan are such a lovely couple.
RT @amyhuberman: Ah yes there I am having a little think about constitutional law and tribunals and suing people and stuff. Legal drama #St…
@KeithWalsh2fm So awkward. @boshea5 lurking in the background is funny.
My 2nd eldest big brother Jess. It’s very unusual to get a pic where he’s not messing or making… https://t.co/agfzEmtEvp
RT @Kodaline: New album nearly ready! Can't wait to share it with you guys oh so soon! https://t.co/WBC5XHoh5I
If you’re going to guess @98FM ‘s #secretsound will you please do me a favour & check this list of guesses already made. https://t.co/9SD6ilfmim So many people wasting their guess. It’s nearly €10k!
https://t.co/Blf3UBr8Vi
@MartyGuilfoyle @raye @DoireannGarrihy Only took them 4 takes. ☺️Woo hoo guys, you got a retweet. 👍🏻👍🏻
RT @Kodaline: Had such a blast ringing in the New Year in Dublin, can't wait for Malahide Castle in June! 📹 @raykeoghmedia https://t.co/Atn…
So Irritating!! 😡 awkward moment when Pierce Brosnan was asked what it's like to be a British icon https://t.co/Bp9o0bxiip
@Kodaline It’s great to have the gig to look forward to lads 👍🏻😊
Had a brilliant time at this gig with my little sister. https://t.co/J3htAD3dhJ @Kodaline
RT @Kodaline: We know it's 6 months away but we are way too excited about this gig! Who's coming? https://t.co/W5ps7ANKzQ
@Kodaline ME! 🙋🏼‍♀️
RT @beccafly: https://t.co/E0Dd7xms83
@Aoife_Dooley That person sounds like a right twat, following you around the internet. Fecking weirdo. You’re well able for them. They don’t know who they’re dealing with!
@StyleGuideBlog Just watched first episode. Gas!

@StyleGuideBlog I gave up ironing anything well over 10 years ago. I used to iron my husband’s shirts for him. That was until he started complaining about the way I was ironing them. Now I iron nothing. He pays a lady to iron his shirts. #sillyman 😬
@StyleGuideBlog I’ve got it set to record the series. It got good comments online. I rarely watch tv at all.
@yankeedoodlepad 😘 You’re the best Karen 💜

@lecheiless Hi, I often see students from your school littering. Have just seen some boys throw paper bags from the takeaway on the ground when there was a bin right in front of them. It should be taught at home that littering is horrible but in school would be good too.

I can’t stand rubberneckers. They cause traffic jams on the opposite side of the road to the accident. What are they hoping to see?! 😡’The BAFTAs were last week' - Gardaí fine drivers for filming accident in Co. Cork https://t.co/KWJl3udol4 #rubberneckers
@IL0VEthe80s @80slegends Used to put them flat on a wall & rub a stone over them. Loved the smell.

@marygreenwell1 There’s a huge amount of people still not on Twitter but have no problem with Facebook etc. so we’re doing well! The power of Twitter was proven yesterday when a Jenner/Kardashian tweeted about not using Snapchat anymore & their stock dropped. That’s more her power tho tbh!
RT @Kodaline: Great to have @kygo In Dublin tonight great show and @SteveKodaline joined him on stage https://t.co/epsa3GirKb
@Kodaline @kygo @SteveKodaline Good man @SteveKodaline , did you just get off a plane & go straight to the gig?!
I joined Twitter 9 years ago today. Mad. #MyTwitterAnniversary https://t.co/WCV0ZEFACd
Synchronised bunny nose twitching. 🐰#bunnies https://t.co/ssy1KI2BkV
@louisemcsharry Genuinely scares me! But then when Worzel Gummidge used to change his head that freaked me out big time. https://t.co/q8cJRpFrvF
@SteveKodaline Woooohh!! Looking swish.
@yankeedoodlepad @Kodaline It’d be great Karen. Every gig if there’s I’ve been to has been fantastic. 💜
@yankeedoodlepad @Kodaline Hee hee Karen. Maybe some day we’ll go to a gig together!
@Kodaline Is liomsa é 👋🏻 or something like that. 😊☺️
@SharonLeavy1 My stomach is all twisty.
@SharonLeavy1 I was all ready to read the comments stating animal abuse. 🤪
@AlexinCork Guessing you know about this already but just in case! https://t.co/Zr6EYAD6Qb
